string.text:
Artifact "Sea urchin" is produced by transmutation in the joint anomalies "Springboard" just four ingredients:
Bloodsucker tentacle
Crystal thorn
Stone Blood
Slime.
transformation occurs within 5-10 minutes

This extremely rare Artefact is also called "Dream Killer" as the users Alpha and Beta brain waves are slowed sufficiently to reduce the effects of Psi attacks. Gives additional protection from attacks of many creatures of the Zone. Its negative effects are a reduced rate of health recovery - Use only with the Artefacts which increase health.

Artefact is a mutated mushroom formed in the anomaly Springboard. Extremely rare. Forms within a radius of 0.3 meters a localised force field which improves immunity to bullet wounds. Artefact also has a range of negative effects such as: weakening of the skin to burns, electric shock and chemicals. Stalkers on finding this Artefact immediately dispose of it because of its negative properties but it would be wise to hold on to it as it seems to have a special energy about it.

A mysterious Artefact. There are two recorded instances of its occurrence in the Zone.......
* It appeared, according to rumors, when the stalkers of the clan of 'Monolith' entered the center zone. At the altar they preyed, asking the Monolith to gave them a sign of its existence. One night the Artefact fell from heaven to earth. The fanatics took this as a sign from the monolith.
* According to scientists it was formed by the merger of several high altitude air anomalies.
 A very rare item formed only in the area surrounding the Chernobyl nuclear power plant.
Scientists have proclaimed this is a new and rare Artefact found by a drunk Stalker near the Bar. Artefact gives a small improvement in health and chemical protection but lowers bullet resistance.

%c[1,1,1,1 ]___%c[255,255,255,255] Backpack Radiation %c[255,255,1,1] +15\n %c[default] The origin of the Artefact is not known and has only been found in the Zone a few times. Artefact gives good protection from impact, but reduces endurance. Radioactive.

This Artefact is small and looks like a set of dumbbells - and has the weight to match - 18Kg!. Incredibly strong and dense - can not be cut, melted or pressed. Unknown origin. Improves health and reduces radiation. No negative properties - apart from its large mass.

The exact origin of this Artefact is unknown. Scientists argue that this Artefact is formed under the influence of two anomalies - 'Springboard' and 'Elektra'. It is theorised this rare Artefact is located in the middle of the anomalies held together by electro-weak unification. The interacting fields make it rotate. Protects from electric shock but there is a reduction in bullet resistance and immunity to radiation...

Artefact, which appeared in the zone recently. Scientists believe it is formed from Nuclear-chemosynthesis between Baryon type dark matter and the Artefact 'Stone Flower'. Looks like a lump of coal. Artefact gives good protection from Psionic waves and raises resistance to radioactive contamination, but with greatly increased fatigue. Make sure you have Artefacts that counter the negative effects.

%c[1,1,1,1 ]___%c[255,255,255,255] Backpack Radiation %c[255,255,1,1] +5\n %c[default] Artefact generated from the radiogenic nuclide of the Artefact "xZs2x4". It protects the skin from burns and media impact. Slightly radioactive.

Rarely found in the Zone and not much is known about how it is created. Provides very good protection from heat sources and attacks from Zone mutants. Explosion and strike immunities are reduced. Demand by scientists.

Substance formed by the mutual co-existence of anomalies 'Fountain' and 'Fruit Punch' and Lanthanide metals. Has a number of positive attributes, and some negative. Was found recently by a Stalker nicknamed Gadget. He picked it up with no protective gloves, only just managing to get it to his backpack before his hand vaporised. On selling the Artefact he was able to get a mechanical prosthetic hand.

%c[1,1,1,1 ]___%c[255,255,255,255] Backpack Radiation %c[255,255,1,1] +20\n %c[default] Artefact often can be found in Radioactive areas. Increases stamina but has negative radiation attributes. The main central core is surrounded by spinning smaller mercury balls. Special gloves are recommended for handling due to its radiation and high thermal energy. Scientists have discovered that some of the Artefact actually consists of of the mercury isotope Hg-194, and can be used to manufacture medicinal drugs and vaccines for a wide variety of dangerous Zone diseases.

Scientists believe that this new mutation belongs to the genus family of nettles. First found by an unknown Stalker on a Surveying Expedition deep into the Zone. Synthetic hybrids have been the focus of experiments in the X-18 and X-16 laboratories. Able to reject chemical components and reduces bleeding by speeding up blood clotting.

Artefact formed in the anomaly 'Elektra' from a variety of metal objects and alloys. The high energy states of outer valence electrons causes a localised luminescence. After detailed study, researchers found that the Artefact actually produces electricity in small amounts. Using the Artefact causes the skin to soften - increasing the risk of bleeding out when cut. Resistance to radioactive contamination is lowered but there is increased resistance to burns.

%c[1,1,1,1 ]___%c[255,255,255,255] Backpack Radiation %c[255,255,1,1] +7\n %c[default]Scientists have been trying to unravel the mystery of this Artefact. Stronger than titanium and harder than diamond but weighs less than a kilogram. Creates a slight protective field, distorting the trajectory of bullets. Adverse Effects - radioactive and reduces the resistance to impact injuries.

Artefact formed by the combination of three anomalies - 'The Fountain', 'Heat' and 'Fruit Punch'. Extremely rare. Scientists and researchers still do not fully understand this Artefact, but it's obvious that in order to be created the fusing of the 3 anomalies must of released an enormous amount of energy. Using this Artefact increases the body's metabolism giving greater endurance and quicker blood clotting. Higher metabolism causes higher body temperature forcing body to the skins surface and a greater vulnerability to wounds.

%c[1,1,1,1 ]___%c[255,255,1,60] Longing for a real Zone Woman.....100%\n %c[default]An Artefact of absolute beauty and wonder. Many STALKERS scour the Zone looking for this rare item - but there's only one. The presence of this Artefact raises blood pressure significantly which assists in expelling chemical and radioactive agents. The drawback is that the user quickly tires. Slightly radioactive and hot to touch.

%c[1,1,1,1]___%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+11
%c[default]The absolute received by a transmutation of the artefact "Grandmother's Beads of the Burer". The recipe, obviously, has been received by practical consideration. What became with its author - it is possible to guess by a skeleton lying nearby. From merits it is necessary to note increase in stability of the owner of the artefact to bullet wounds in comparison with predecessor. It is radioactive.
Modifiy "the Beads of the Grandma of the Burer" throw in anomaly "Burner".
%c[255,255,255,255]Time of a transmutation %c[255,224,224,160]5 minutes of the Zone
%c[255,255,255,255]Probability of a successful transmutation %c[255,1,255,1]75 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Probability of degeneration %c[255,255,1,1]25 %%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]-15
%c[255,255,255,255]Bleeding %c[255,1,255,1]-133 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Burn %c[255,1,255,1]+15 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Rupture %c[255,1,255,1]+15 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Bullet-proof %c[255,1,255,1]+1 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Rare artefact. You will not find it in one anomaly as it is a live biosubstance. It is formed from bezoar a stomach of old controllers at influence on them anomaly "Burner". It is not enough, who in the Zone knows this recipe and existence of the given artefact. Sakharov people assume that this live substance is formed of not digested bones of bones of an electrochimera under long influence of the perverted gastric juice of the controller, hypnotic aura constantly surrounding it and the subsequent influence extremely high temperatures. It is necessary to guess only as this biomass thus does not perish.
 
Bezoar of the controller in anomaly "Burner".
%c[255,255,255,255]Time of a transmutation %c[255,224,224,160]5 minutes of the Zone
%c[255,255,255,255]Probability of a successful transmutation %c[255,1,255,1]75 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Probability of degeneration %c[255,255,1,1]25 %%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+3
%c[255,255,255,255]Bullet-proof %c[255,1,255,1]+2 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact formed in the "Springboard" anomaly. Represents the remains of plants pressed and fancifully bent by strong gravitational field. At artefact carrying on a belt immunity to influence of gravitational anomalies, such as "Vortex" and "Whirligig" increases, and also the insignificant effect of the protective field reducing defeat from small arms is shown. It is slightly radioactive. The sale price is low because of wide circulation. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+5
%c[255,255,255,255]Bullet-proof %c[255,1,255,1]+4 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Is born in anomaly "Springboard". Such artefact can be found in few areas of the Zone. Impregnations of metal connections give a beautiful play of light. Examining of this artefact near to a fire calms one at night.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+10
%c[255,255,255,255]Bullet-proof %c[255,1,255,1]+6 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact extremely seldom formed in anomaly "Springboard". Beautiful formation with a smooth surface and phosphorescent colour impregnations. Shines with greenish light all round itself in a radius of 1-2 metres at night, hence stalkers gave it such a name. Represents the remains of plants, soils and in general everything that gets into direct contact with anomaly pressed and fancifully bent by strong gravitational field. At artefact carrying on a belt immunity to influence of gravitational anomalies, such as "Vortex" and "Whirligig" strongly increases, and also the effect of the protective field reducing defeat from small arms is shown. But thus the artefact is strongly radioactive, therefore long carrying is counter-indicative. The sale price very high. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations and military men.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+3
%c[255,255,255,255]Impact %c[255,1,255,1]+2 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Rupture %c[255,1,255,1]+2 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact formed in anomaly "Vortex". Represents the remains of plants, soils and other small objects that get into contact with anomaly pressed and fancifully bent by strong gravitational field. At artefact carrying on a belt immunity to influence of gravitational anomalies, such as "Springboard" increases The sale price is low because of wide circulation. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+5
%c[255,255,255,255]Impact %c[255,1,255,1]+5 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Rupture %c[255,1,255,1]+5 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Beautiful artefact formed in anomaly "Vortex". Represents the remains of plants pressed and fancifully bent by strong gravitational field,. At artefact carrying on a belt immunity to influence of gravitational anomalies, such as "Springboard" increases. The price is of sale and probability of occurrence is average. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations, collectors and jewellers.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+10
%c[255,255,255,255]Impact %c[255,1,255,1]+8 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Rupture %c[255,1,255,1]+8 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact extremely seldom appearing in anomaly "Vortex". Beautiful formation with a smooth surface. Shines space round itself in a radius of 1-2 metres at night. Represents the metal pressed and fancifully bent by strong gravitational field with a mix of everything that in general gets near to the anomaly at the moment of discharge. At artefact carrying on a belt immunity to influence of gravitational anomalies, such as "Springboard" increases. The sale price is very high. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations, collectors and jewellers.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]-5
%c[255,255,255,255]Endurance %c[255,255,1,1]-73
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact appearing near to anomaly "Burner". Tear small formation with the cracked lustrous surface. Stalkers say that at carrying of this artefact radiation level in an organism decreases, but because of a strong thermal emission endurance worsens. The price is low. Interest in the artefact is shown by collectors and jewellers.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]-10
%c[255,255,255,255]Endurance %c[255,255,1,1]-36
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact found near anomaly "Burner". Translucent reddish formation of a spherical form. Stalkers say that artefact carrying reduces radiation level in an organism. But because of a strong thermal emission endurance worsens. The price is average. Interest in the artefact is shown by collectors and jewellers.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]-15
%c[255,255,255,255]Endurance %c[255,255,1,1]-27
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact very rarely found near anomaly "Burner". Its name describes the artefacts form, it is a big poured crystal of reddish colour. Stalkers assert that at its carrying radiation level in an organism considerably decreases. But, alas, the artefact does not in the best way influence endurance. The price is high. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Health %c[255,1,255,1]+100 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]-3
%c[255,255,255,255]Impact %c[255,255,1,1]-3 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Rupture %c[255,255,1,1]-3 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]+3 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact formed in anomaly "Whirligig". Represents ugly reddish formation from pressed and fancifully bent polymerized remains of plants, soil, a flesh and bones of lost stalkers and mutants. At artefact carrying on a belt the mystical image slightly accelerates healing of wounds. At the same time reduces stability to physical damages. Among stalkers exists a legend that in this artefact the force of people who were lost in the anomaly is contained. The sale price is low because of wide circulation. Interest in the artefact is shown by physicians and every possible religious cults.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Health %c[255,1,255,1]+200 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]-5
%c[255,255,255,255]Impact %c[255,255,1,1]-5 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Rupture %c[255,255,1,1]-5 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]+5 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact formed in anomaly "Whirligig". Represents ugly yellowish formation from pressed and fancifully bent polymerized remains of a flesh and bones of the lost stalkers. At artefact carrying on a belt the mystical image slightly accelerates process of healing of wounds. Among stalkers exists a legend that in this artefact the force of people who were lost in the anomaly is contained. At the same time reduces stability to physical damages. The price is of sale and probability of occurrence is average. Interest in the artefact is shown by physicians and every possible religious cults.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Health %c[255,1,255,1]+300 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]-10
%c[255,255,255,255]Impact %c[255,255,1,1]-7 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Rupture %c[255,255,1,1]-7 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]+10 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Very rare artefact formed in anomaly "Whirligig". Represents zheltovato-red brilliant formation from pressed and fancifully bent polymerized remains of a live fresh flesh. Among stalkers exists a legend that in this artefact the force of people who were lost in the anomaly is contained. At artefact carrying on a belt the mystical image within several seconds completely restores health, and any bleeding stops. At the same time stability to physical damages considerably worsens. The sale price is very high. Basically this artefact appears in anomalies absorbing a great number of organic objects. Interest in the artefact is shown by physicians and every possible religious cults.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Endurance %c[255,1,255,1]+27
%c[255,255,255,255]Electroshock %c[255,255,1,1]-10 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]-10 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact formed in anomaly "Elektra". The translucent amorphous very simple formation which is seldom letting out round small sparks. Artefact carrying on a belt slightly increases endurance, but leaves the person vulnerable to electricity. The price is average. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations, collectors and jewellers.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Endurance %c[255,1,255,1]+64
%c[255,255,255,255]Electroshock %c[255,255,1,1]-10 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]-10 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact formed in anomaly "Elektra". Basic translucent amorphous formation with rays of light beating from within, seldom emiting round itself small sparks. Artefact carrying on a belt slightly increases endurance, but leaves the person vulnerable to electricity. The price is high. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations, collectors and jewellers.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Endurance %c[255,1,255,1]+100
%c[255,255,255,255]Electroshock %c[255,255,1,1]-10 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]-10 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artifact found around anomaly "Elektra". Easy translucent amorphous formation with the shone core, letting out round itself small sparks. Artefact carrying on a belt considerably increases endurance. But if hit by anomaly "Elektra" chances of survival of the person carrying this artefact remain minimal. The price is very high. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations, collectors and jewellers.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Bleeding %c[255,1,255,1]-66 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Burn %c[255,255,1,1]-20 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Chemical burn %c[255,255,1,1]-10 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact found near to anomaly "Fruit Punch". Represents translucent jelly formation. At artefact carrying on a belt the probability of loss of a considerable quantity of blood decreases at severe wounds, but vulnerability to any kinds of burns thus increases. The price is low. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Bleeding %c[255,1,255,1]-133 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Burn %c[255,255,1,1]-10 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Chemical burn %c[255,255,1,1]-10 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact found near anomaly "Fruit Punch". Carrying of this translucent jelly formations on a belt reduces probability of loss of a considerable quantity of blood at severe wounds, but makes the person vulnerable to any kinds of burns. The price is average. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Bleeding %c[255,1,255,1]-233 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Burn %c[255,255,1,1]-5 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Chemical burn %c[255,255,1,1]-10 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact formed in anomaly "Fruit Punch". At artefact carrying on a belt the probability of loss of a considerable quantity of blood decreases at severe wounds, but vulnerability to any kinds of burns thus increases. The price is high. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Impact %c[255,1,255,1]+10 %\n \n%c[255,224,224,160]Origin of the artefact is not known. Represents two hard disks linked together by viscous slime. It can independently move, making small jumps thanks to a variable gravitational field. At carrying on a belt reduces probability of occurrence of serious traumas as a result of blows is little. The sale price is very high. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Impact %c[255,1,255,1]+4 %\n \n%c[255,224,224,160]Origin of artefact is not known. Two hard disks linked together by slime. The artefact slightly reduces defeat from all types of gravitational anomalies and explosions, absorbing shock waves. The price of sale is high. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Electroshock %c[255,1,255,1]+15 %\n \n%c[255,224,224,160]Origin of artefact is not known. Ridge brilliant formation. Very useful artefact for its carrier. Improves all characteristics of radiating firmness and a susceptibility to an electricity. The impression is made that the artefact strengthens any processes proceeding round it. The price of sale is huge. Particular interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Chemical burn %c[255,1,255,1]+15 %\n \n%c[255,224,224,160]This artefact is so rare that many researchers do not guess at all that such substance can exist under natural conditions. Tears away caustic chemical components.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Bullet-proof %c[255,1,255,1]+5 %\n \n%c[255,224,224,160]Remarkable artefact, protect it. It is good that has only merits (the most unique phenomenon as only positive properties the absolutes and rare hypermodified, as a rule, possess). Scientists break grey-haired heads how similar properties can be received in vitro. Interest to it show, perhaps, all who feel like it.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]-5
%c[255,255,255,255]Bleeding %c[255,255,1,1]+100 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact very often it is possible to find outBleeding near anomaly "Witches Galantines". It reduces radiation from a human body. However with the weakened immunity the artefact also causes strong bleedings in people. The price is low. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations, collectors and jewellers.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]-10
%c[255,255,255,255]Bleeding %c[255,255,1,1]+100 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact can be found near to anomaly "Witches Galantines". It deduces radiation from a human body, but at the same time opens bleedings so at carrying of this artefact it is necessary to be careful and not to forget about its negative influence. The price is average. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations, collectors and jewellers.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,1,255,1]-20
%c[255,255,255,255]Bleeding %c[255,255,1,1]+100 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact found near the anomaly "Witches Galantines". It deduces radiation from a human body. However at constant use of this artefact the person has a risk of loss of a considerable quantity of blood. The price is high. Interest in the artefact is shown by scientific organisations, collectors and jewellers.%c[default]

%c[255,255,255,255]Rupture %c[255,1,255,1]+15 %
%c[255,255,255,255]Bullet-proof %c[255,1,255,1]+7 %
 
%c[255,224,224,160]Artefact of an unknown origin. Scientists cannot solve till now the recipe of reception of this miracle of the Zone. At carrying on a belt firmness of an organism to any physical damages considerably increases. It is radioactive. The price is very high. Particular interest in the artefact is shown by physicians.%c[default]

The Fruit Punch anomaly is able to create such an artefact at the rarest, most extreme collection of physical conditions. The result is a semi-transparent, hard object. When worn on the belt, this artefact will coagulate the blood from wounds, thus dereasing the amount of blood loss. However, the chances of receiving damage from burns is increased. This artefact is of great interest to Scientific Organizations in and around the Zone. A rare and expensive artefact.

It is certain that this artefact is created by the anomaly called Fruit Punch. When worn on the belt, this artefact will coagulate the blood from wounds, thus dereasing the amount of blood loss. However, the chances of receiving damage from burns is increased. This artefact is of moderate interest to Scientific Organizations in and around the Zone. A common and inexpensive artefact.

Formed by the Fruit Punch anomaly. The negative qualities of this artifact are compensated by the fact that it heightens the coagulation quality of blood. However, the chances of receiving damage from burns is increased. This artefact is highly sought after by Scientific Organizations in and around the Zone. It's not often that one encounters such a rare artefact, and Traders will pay well for it too.

Artefact formed in the Whirligig anomaly. It is an ugly reddish colour, pressed and fancifully curved polymerized residues of plants, soil and bones. When wearing an artifact on your belt, a kind of mysterious way, slightly faster healing of wounds and stops bleeding. Do stalkers is believed that this artifact lies the power of people who perished in the anomaly. However, this artifact attracts predators to the owner. Selling price is low due to a fairly wide distribution. Interest in the artifact exhibit scientific organizations, primarily doctors and all sorts of religious cults.

This artefact is formed in anomalous zones with intense thermal activity. Actively consumes excessive heat, remaining cool to the touch throughout. This artefact is created when heavy metals fall into the "Burner" anomaly. This artefact eliminates radiation wonderfully. It is highly valued by S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s and quite difficult to find. Demands a high price, and is of great interest within Scientific Organizations throughout the Zone.

%c[1,1,1,1]______ %c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+5\n%c[default]Born in the Springboard anomaly, this artefact is made up of a granite-like stone deformed by an extreme gravitational force, resulting in a crystallized formation that has not been explained by science to date. Can provide moderate protection against bullets, and is slightly radioactive. The bits of metallic compounds create a beautiful light play. It is very calming to study this artefact at night by the fire.

Artefact produced by the Heat anomaly. Teardrop-shaped formation with a cracked glazed surface. Stalkers say that wearing an artifact reduces damage from the bites of wild beasts. Impairs endurance. The price is low. Interest in the artifact exhibit collectors and jewelers.

the Origin of an artefact is not known. Ridge brilliant education. Very useful artefact for its{his} carrier{bearer}. Improves all characteristics of radiating stability{resistance} and a susceptibility to an electricity. The impression is made, that the artefact strengthens any processes proceeding around of it{him}. The price of sale huge. Special interest to an artefact is shown with the scientific organizations.

the Origin of an artefact is not known. Two rigid disks linked together by slime. The artefact slightly reduces defeat from all types of gravitational anomalies and explosions, absorbing shock waves. The price of sale high. Interest to an artefact is shown with the scientific organizations.

Shaped like a DNA helix, the beads are created in the Burner anomaly and pulsate, generating emissions beneficial to the human body. These emissions increase the metabolism of any living creature, accelerating clotting and healing of open wounds. The exact mechanism behind this artifact continues to puzzle Scientists. An extremely rare artefact: it has no negative qualities. Scientists have never been able to duplicate it under laboratory conditions.

According to Professor Sakharov, this was the first artefact the Ecologists managed to create under controlled laboratory conditions. Now, this artefact is so rare that many Researchers can't even imagine that such a substance could even exist at all. Provides excellent protection against caustic chemical components.

the origin of this rare artefact is unkknown. resembles two rigid disks linked together by viscous slime. According to the opinion of some Scientists, this artefact is a hybrid between the artefacts Battery and Shell. Highly sought after by Zone Scientists, and they will pay good money for it as well...

The Elektra anomaly sometimes births this artefact. Thanks to its heavily crystallized molecules, this electrostatic artefact is a powerful absorbent of electric charges, able to protect its bearer from electric shocks of up to 5,000 volts. S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s readily keep it for themselves, rather than trade it because of it's positive qualities. If sold, it goes for a good price, and because it has a nice external appearance, it is highly sought after by Jewellers dealing with Traders from a safe distance outside the Zone.

This unique electrostatic artifact can resonate under the influence of psi-waves. S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s have learned to fine-tune the artefact so that it resonates in opposite phase to the main source of emissions, thus fully or significantly neutralizing their effects. This artefact is formed inside of the Elektra anomaly on rare occasions. It has powerful restorative abilities, but at the cost of electrical resistance. a very rare, and expensive artefact. Highly sought after by members within the Scientific Community, as well as Jewellers, and Collectors.

The rare artefact. You will not find it{him} in one anomaly as he is an alive biosubstance. It is formed from Bezoar from stomach of old controllers at influence on them anomaly until hot. Time Transmuratsii approximately 5 minutes, probability of successful end with education of the Plasma caterpillar{track} approximately 75%. It is not enough, who in the Zone knows this recipe and existence of the given artefact. People Sakharov assume, that this alive substance is formed of not digested bones of bones of an Electro-Chimera under long influence of the perverted gastric juice of the Controller, hypnotic aura constantly surrounding it{him} and the subsequent influence extremely heats. Remains only to guess, as this biomass thus does not perish.

%c[1,1,1,1]______ %c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]0\n%c[default]the Absolute received by transmutation of an artefact Beads Grandmother Burer in current of 5 minutes in anomaly until hot. The recipe, obviously, has been received by practical consideration. From positive qualities it is necessary to note increase in stability of the owner of an artefact to bullet wounds.

Artefact produced by the Elektra anomaly. Translucent amorphous formation sometimes found generating small lightning-sparks. Wearing an artifact on your belt slightly increases stamina. The price is low. Interest in the artifact exhibit scientific organizations, collectors and jewelers.

Artefact produced by the Heat anomaly. Translucent reddish spherical shape. Stalkers say that wearing an artifact reduces damage from the bites of wild beasts. Impairs endurance. Price is average. Interest in the artifact exhibit collectors and jewelers.

the Artefact of a unknown origin. Scientists till now cannot solve the recipe of reception of this miracle of the Zone. At carrying on a belt{zone} stability{resistance} of an organism any physical damages considerably{much} increases. It is radioactive. The price very high. Special interest to an artefact is shown by physicians.

%c[1,1,1,1]______ %c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+10\n%c[default]Artefact that occasionally formed in the anomaly Vortex. Education with a beautiful mirrored surface. At night, light the space around them within a radius of 1-2 meters. Is a compressed and intricately curved strong gravity remains of plants, soil and anything else that gets in the anomaly at the time of discharge. When wearing the artifact at the waist increases the immunity to shock the gravitational anomalies, such as a Springboard, but this plague, due to powerful gravitational field pulls the bullet that was not pleased with her owner. Selling price is very high. The probability of occurrence - low. Interest in the artifact exhibit scientific organizations, collectors and jewelers.

%c[1,1,1,1]______ %c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+5\n%c[default]Beautiful artefact formed in the Vortex anomaly. Is a compressed and intricately curved strong gravity remains of plants, soil and anything else that gets in the vicinity of the anomaly. When wearing the artifact at the waist increases the immunity to shock the gravitational anomalies, such as a springboard. Sale price and the probability of occurrence - the average. Interest in the artifact exhibit scientific organizations, collectors and jewelers.

%c[1,1,1,1]______ %c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+3\n%c[default]Artefact formed in the anomaly Springboard. Is a compressed and intricately curved strong gravity remains of plants, soil and anything else that gets in the vicinity of the anomaly. When wearing the artifact at the waist increases the immunity to retractor gravitational anomalies, such as the funnel and Medusa and has little effect shield which reduces damage from small arms. Slightly radioactive. Selling price is low due to a fairly wide distribution. Interest in the artifact exhibit scientific organizations.

Artefact formed in the Whirligig anomaly. It is an ugly yellowish formation of pressed and fancifully curved polymerized residues of plants, soil and bones. When wearing an artifact on your belt, a kind of mystical way, greatly speeds up the healing and well-stops bleeding. Do stalkers is believed that this artifact lies the power of people who perished in the anomaly. However, this artifact attracts predators to the owner. Sale price and the probability of occurrence - the average. Interest in the artifact exhibit scientific organizations, primarily doctors and all sorts of religious cults.

%c[1,1,1,1]______ %c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1]+10\n%c[default]Artefact that occasionally forms inside the Springboard anomaly .. Education with a beautiful mirrored surface and colored phosphorescent inclusions. At night, light greenish light all around him in a radius of 1-2 meters, for which he received from stalkers name. Is a compressed and intricately curved strong gravity remains of plants, soil and anything else that gets in the vicinity of the anomaly. When wearing an Artefact on the belt greatly increases the immunity to gravitational anomalies, such as the Vortex and Whirligig, and also has the effect of reducing damage from small arms. But it is highly radioactive, so it should be worn with caution. Selling price is very high. The probability of occurrence - low. Scientific Organizations, and the Military seem rather interested in these Artefacts for various reasons...

the Artefact it is possible to find Rusty hair near to anomaly. He deduces{removes} radiation from an organism of the person, but at the same time opens bleedings so at carrying this artefact it is necessary to be cautious and to not forget about its{his} negative influence. The price average. Interest to an artefact is shown with the scientific organizations, collectors and jewellers.

the Artefact is found more often nearby from anomaly with Rusty hair. He deduces{removes} radiation from an organism of the person. However at constant use of this artefact the person has a risk of loss of a plenty of blood. The price high. Interest to an artefact is shown with the scientific organizations, collectors and jewellers.

The end result of the interaction between the Burnt Fuzz anomaly, and a human corpse. The Thorn artefact, when worn on the belt, will continuously pierce, and prick one's side; causing minor lacerations, and bleeding. The upside of this seemingly negative effect, is the artefact's uncanny ability to leach harmful radionucliodes from the body. Although quite widespread throughout the Zone... a keen interest in this artefact is still exhibited by Scientific Organizations, Treasure Collectors, and Exotic Jewellers...

Rare artefact formed in the Springboard anomaly. It is a yellowish-red brilliant concoction of pressed and fancifully curved polymerized residues of plants, soil and bones. Do stalkers is believed that this artifact concluded souls perished in the anomaly of people. When wearing an artifact on your belt, a kind of mysterious way, within a few seconds to fully recover health and stop any bleeding. At the same time deteriorating stamina and resistance to psy-attack monsters telepaths. Also note the stalkers fun fact when you wear on your belt, this artifact is constantly hungry. Selling price is very high. The probability of occurrence - low. Interest in the artifact exhibit scientific organizations, primarily doctors and all sorts of religious cults.

%c[1,1,1,1]______%c[255,255,255,255]Radiation %c[255,255,1,1] +3\n%c[default]Artefact formed in the Vortex anomaly. A compressed, and intricately curvacious remnant of various plant-life, soil and other small objects that were sucked into the Vortex itself... When wearing the artefact on the belt, it tends to decrease the negative effects of gravitational anomalies, such as the Springboard anomaly. The Quirk is relatively easy to find, and as a result it does not demand a very high price. It continues to be studied by Scientists, Ecologists, and the Military in the attempt to determine it's full capabilities...

The Contaminated Zone was aglow with the brightest of lights, almost unbearable to the human eye. You could virtually see the clouds in the sky turning into vapor. After a moment of dead silence there came rattling thunder, and then the earth shook. People fell to the ground, screwing up their eyes and covering their ears. Those who could still stand ran for their lives. It looked as though all the nuclear fuel buried under the Sarcophagus had suddenly exploded. The next day the Army cordoned off the new Zone..\nThe satellites helped to establish that the epicenter of the explosion was not actually in the vicinity of the NPP reactors, but about half a kilometer away. It is believed that the personnel employed at the Station died instantly...\nThough many people still remained within the cordoned area. The rescue operation soon proved a pointless endeavor, as all the people and machinery sent deep into the area would die or malfunction immediately. A little while after the disaster, the Zone diameter hopped out by a few more kilometers. Most of the government troops guarding the border line and the research teams stationed there perished instantly. Panic stricken, people took to flight. The residents of nearby towns and villages were hastily evacuated. An enormous danger is looming over the world and we can only guess what its full impact may be...

Two years have passed since the second major disaster inside the contaminated Zone surrounding the Chernobyl Nuclear Powewr Plant .. The continuously growing death-toll, countless missing persons, dead cattle, decaying buildings, and maimed forests continues to grow in numbers daily, with no signs of ending soon. Until this day, Scientists have no explanation as to what exactly happened in at the NPP .. Meanwhile .. countless Anomalies were discovered in the area, and the Zone continues to expand as each day passes...

Following in the tracks of those foolhardy loners that call themselves S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s, Scientific Research expeditions are once again embarking on an in-depth study of the Zone. However, the perimeter once 'guarded' by the Army has sinced gained some other, more dangerous inhabitants .. from common poachers to the worst kind of Bandit scum stemming from the Russian criminal underworld. Most of the S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s roam the Zone in search of Anomalies and the so-called Artefacts they produce .. all in the pursuit of the substantial wealth they promise those foolish enough to pursuue them deep into the heart of the Zone...

The Army, including Special Forces Units headed by Paramilitary S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Detachments, launched a massive raid deep into the Zone. Their objective was to break through to the Chernobyl NPP, and wipe out what was believed to be the cause of all of the Anomalous fields throughout the Zone. If not successful, they were to at least obtain first-hand information on the Zone's true 'Source'. This doomed endeavor, involving over a thousand military personnel, was a complete, and utter failure. Isolated groups of survivors were forced to settle within the Zone's perimeter with absolutely no hopes of being rescued anytime soon .. they, like so many others, have simply been forgotten...

A deserted Army Base next to a dilapidated hamlet and a small marsh. The village is an eerie place, literally swarming with mutants - the bloodsuckers alone are legion. S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s do their best to keep away from it, even if it means going extra kilometers around it. The anarchists from the Freedom faction have settled down in the Army base. The road connecting the base to the Zone is guarded by the infamous Brain Scorcher, which blocks the way to Pripyat and the Chernobyl NPP...

\nMembers of the criminal underworld who came to the Zone for different reasons: to make money by selling artifacts, hide from the law or trade in weapons. The Zone is full of bandits, ranging from common thugs to serious criminals, most of whom are members of one gang or another. Although the Zone gangs frequently fight among themselves, the criminal element still poses a serious problem for normal S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s ...

\nA paramilitary group known for its discipline, whose members live according to a strict code. Duty members are the only group to refuse to trade unique items from the Zone with the outside world. According to rumors, all artifacts found by the group are passed on to scientists. Its members consider protecting the outside world from the Zone's dangers their primary objective. Most of the group's operations concern destroying monsters, hence Duty raids often save normal stalkers from serious trouble. The faction has long been at war with Freedom.

\nAnarchists and daredevils who declare themselves fighters for a free access to the Zone and consequently find themselves in constant conflict with the army, military S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s and the Duty faction. These so-called "freedom-fighters" believe in sharing all information about the Zone with the rest of the world and challenge the state's monopoly over the Zone's secrets and wonders.

\nThe most clandestine and secretive faction in the Zone; some don't even believe in it's existence. There are those who regularly use Mercenary services as they are truly professionals, able to quickly deal with any S.T.A.L.K.E.R. and even annihilate a small group of opponents. Their services do not come cheap - the Mercs demand a king's ransom for their services in money or artifacts. The location of their base remains a secret, suggesting that it is deep inside the Zone.

\nS.T.A.L.K.E.R.s that aren't from any main faction, and the name usually applies to smaller 'packs' of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s .. They are neutral individuals, and most will trade or offer various missions. It can be assumed that other 'Loners' live a similar life. Their main rival Factions are 'Bandits' and the 'Military'. They are also hostile towards the 'Mercenaries' and the 'Monolith' .. although there are few encounters between either. They are neutral to the 'Freedom', 'Duty' and Scientific' factions. Whilst not a proper faction of their own as per se, killing a Loner will earn the enmity of every other Loner in the Zone, as word spreads quickly among this nomadic group, and they don't take kindly to murderers...

\nThis group displays many features of a religious sect. Its members believe in the existence of a complex alien crystal, the Monolith, located somewhere in the center of the Zone. Most S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s treat Monolith adepts with contempt and consider them as lunatics. From its inception the group strives to block all progress towards the center of the Zone, protecting the Monolith from other S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s. Rumor has it that the group has a large base deep in the Zone, but its exact location is know only to it's members...

\nMobile Laboratories resemble a small, armored bunker with tiny tinted windows made of hazard-proof glass. The lab is capable of withstanding a lot of damage and with its reliable life-support systems it can work autonomously for several months. The bunker is delivered into the Zone by a transport helicopter. The lab staff never allow visitors past the external air-lock chamber, so no stalker has ever been inside one.

\nPoor souls subjected to prolonged exposure in Yantar and a few other heavily radiated sectors. Careless S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s gone mad and turned into walking corpses. Many such corpses wander the Zone, some wander as far as the perimeter. They are beyond help because the destructive process is irreversible. Zombified S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s are still able to use their weapons, but they are quite dumb and can be heard mumbling meaningless, fragmented sentences to themselves. They gradually lose all their skills and turn into zombies. They are usually very aggressive and can present a serious threat in large numbers.

\nLast Day - One of the first, and once the most powerful Faction in the Zone, consisting of local residents, scientists and all those who remained in the exclusion zone after the Chernobyl accident. For a long time regarded themselves as the only legitimate inhabitants of the Zone, jealously guarding it against any outsiders. It is aggressively tuned to the majority of clans and factions. With its collection of goals considered "gifts" of the Zone and its protection from any abuse and research. It is known that about 2 years ago stalker named Ghost eliminated the leader of the clan, after which the group quickly fell apart, and not being able to choose their leader. Many have joined other groups. Currently, according to unconfirmed information, the clan was restored. It includes former leading scientists of the so-called O-consciousness of the masters of the Monolith factions that have not been religious fanaticism, settled in the area of mercenaries and killers, and some of the local old-timers. According to rumor - the clan has a serious communication outside the perimeter of the Zone, its fighters are well trained and equipped, and skillfully using the gifts of the scientists in the Zone of their achievements and especially the military. The objectives of its size and location of the headquarters - is unknown. In this clan of highly developed intelligence network at the expense of former militants who settled in other groups.

Ammunition: 9x18mm, 9x18mm +P\nThis interesting submachine gun had been developed in Izhevsk at the famous IZHMASH state arms factory during the early 1990's, and first appeared in public circa 1993. Obviously influenced by the somewhat unsuccessful Calico submachine guns, the Bizon (Bison) SMG combined a high capacity "helical" magazine with a more conventional appearance and layout. The Bizon is based on the AKS-74 assault rifle, and actually built on shortened AKS-74 receivers, with the AKS-74 pistol grip, trigger unit and folding butt. Latter models introduced a somewhat improved shape of the pistol grip, with better ergonomics. The large capacity magazine is located under the barrel, and serves as a forearm, resulting in a comfortable hold and trim profile. This firearm is said to be both comfortable to carry and easy to fire, and provides lots of firepower.

Ammunition: 9x19mm Parabellum, 9x19mm +P+, 9x19mm super
 Weight: 3.2 kg
 Clip Capacity: 64 rounds
 The Bizon PP-20 9mm Cobra sub-machine gun is a compact, blowback-operated weapon with selective-fire modes. The blowback action is buffered to provide stability during firing. About 60 per cent of the parts used in the Bizon are taken from other Kalashnikov models, mainly from the AK-74 series, including the left-folding butt-stock, the trigger mechanism and the receiver cover. There is a choice of folding-butt contours and types.The helical-feed magazine holds 64 rounds, although this may be increased. To fit the magazine, two lugs at the forward end protrude over two pins under the muzzle attachment. The feed end of the magazine is then lifted to engage with the existing Kalashnikov magazine catch. When fitted, the magazine can be used as a foregrip. This special model sports a SPO-1 Tulip optical sight with Night Vision capabilities ...
